titles.title: One Vote One Choice Act
One Vote One Choice Act
To amend the Help America Vote Act of 2002 to prohibit States from using ranked choice voting to carry out an election for Federal office, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
One Vote One Choice Act
This bill prohibits states from using ranked-choice voting in federal elections. Ranked-choice voting is a system that allows voters to rank candidates on a ballot in order of preference.
